price: Ole wao walio ikanusha siku yao waliyo ahidiwa.
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
footnotes: Basi maangamio yatawapata wenye kuikataa siku yao waliyo ahidiwa, kwa sababu ya shida na vitisho viliomo katika siku hiyo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
